channel.title: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!!
channel.description: Posts in the discussion thread "TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!!" - We are the Immortal realm of the Kaiju Hungry. We have every kaiju upgrade and normal upgrade. We are almost full so join before the slots fill up! We welcome all S2+ or survivors of the IM. Please Join.

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!!
item.content:encoded: We are now done recruiting. we have reached 50 people. =D

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!!
item.content:encoded: We are almost full, we are at 46 people and we now have all kaiju and normal upgrades. Join before we fill up.

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!.....and we're epic!!
item.content:encoded: EVERYONE season 2 or survivors of IM! Toxic Village needs villagers! We are 3 people away from being able to buy the 45 villager upgrades. We need at least 3 people. So please come and join the great TOXIC VILLAGE! =)

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!.....and we're epic!!
item.content:encoded: Im holding an offer to the next 10 people that join will get 2 Crystal Len's and a super rare will be raffled off the them on Wednesday. Join Fast.

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!.....and we're epic!!
item.content:encoded: Sadly after some people leaving, we need 11 more players to be a full village. Please join!

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!.....and we're epic!!
item.content:encoded: We now have epic monument. We only need 9 more players until we have 50! 4 more and we can get hard corps

item.title: Re: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!
item.content:encoded: Ok we only need 7 more players to get epic guys. Please join Toxic Village!

item.title: TOXIC VILLAGE IS RECRUITING!!
item.content:encoded: We need 19 S2+ players as of now to have 50 people, so please join our village!
